credit_opinion.summary: Verisure is a strong performing credit with low distress score (8) and all bonds trading at or above par (100-103). The company has a massive $17.9bn market cap providing substantial equity cushion against ~$5bn debt. Recent financing at E+225bps and 5.625% demonstrates excellent market access at tight spreads - investment-grade adjacent pricing. Subscription-based recurring revenue model is highly attractive. European market leader in monitored home security with 17 country footprint. Strong H&F sponsorship (45.9%) with public listing providing liquidity. Jul 2026 maturity ($903m) should be easily refinanced.
key_risks: DIY smart home security competition (Ring, Nest)

distress_indicators.trading_signals: All bonds at 100-103 (at/above par). Recent TLB at E+225bps is VERY tight - IG-adjacent. $18bn market cap provides massive equity cushion. Strong market access. Low distress.
